name: Judy's Adventure
description:
You fall asleep one day at the base of a tree. When you wake up, you notice that your key has been stolen! You must platform through various areas to get your house key!

Judy's Adventure is a platformer for the Gameboy Color. The game changes depending on what system you play it on, though. The way this game is meant to be played is through either an EZ Flash JR/Omega (in the game on the omega, you need to go into the menu by pressing both shoulder buttons then go to other settings and turn on read in gba  {it should be at the bottom of the list}) or a GBC cartridge on a GB, MBG, GBL, GBC, AGB, or AGS. Playing this game on  emulators such as mGBA will read the game like it's in a GBC, although this has no been thoroughly tested.
